mapper.select: select * from (select model as dataName, count(model) as dataNum, round(count(model)/(select count(*) from analysis where model is not null)*100,2) as dataPercentage from analysis where model is not null group by model order by dataNum desc) where rownum <= 10

select * from ( select make as dataName, count(make) as dataNum, round(count(make)/(select count(*) from analysis where make is not null)*100,2) as dataPercentage from analysis where make is not null group by make order by dataNum desc ) where rownum <= 10
select * from (select Upper(replace(tags,' ','')) as dataName, count(tags) as dataNum from analysis where tags is not null group by tags order by dataNum desc) where rownum <= 30
